title: Have two mastery 6 tokens, Just got another S in ranked play, but no token was given?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I needed one more S for the 3 mastery tokens in order to get Mastery 7 icon. I just played a ranked match and achieved the mighty S rank, why on earth didn't it give me a token? as it states "Aquired by grading S or above with a level 6 mastery champion"... FML

replies.body:
I just played a normal PVP match and got S- for my performance. It said I got a token so I didn't bother to check, and went into Draft Pick queue with a friend. For some reason, League suddenly closed, forcing me to reopen it & therefore giving me time to check if I received the token...NOPE. Not there :(

ADC: 22/8/7 

May 28th, 2016

Hey there,

That's definitely odd, however it might be related to [an issue that is currently affecting the game in which mastery tokens may not be granted occasionally, this is a known bug and a fix is currently being worked on.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208872326--May-20-We-re-aware-of-an-issue-that-occasionally-prevents-mastery-token-drops-We-re-aiming-to-resolve-this-in-patch-6-11)
